headline: Jim Lehrer, Longtime PBS News Anchor and Debate Moderator, Dies at 85
abstract: For 36 years, mostly teaming with Robert MacNeil, he offered an alternative to network evening news programs with in-depth reporting, interviews and news analysis.
lead_paragraph: Jim Lehrer, the retired PBS anchorman who for 36 years gave public television viewers a substantive alternative to network evening news programs with  in-depth reporting, interviews and analysis of world and national affairs, died on Thursday at his home in Washington. He was 85.
